SEARCH
Module TravelManager
Package org.example.controller

Interface EventController

All Known Implementing Classes:
DynamicEventController, NormalEventController
public interface EventController
The interface that defines the interface for the event controllers. It manages both the state of the event, its type, and the GUI that relate to it.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    getBox()
    Returns the GUI box that is displayed inside the Event list

    • getSubtypes

      ArrayList<String> getSubtypes()
      Returns a list of all the available subtypes for the event's type.
      Returns:
      List of subtypes of the event's type.

    • getSelectedType

      String getSelectedType()
      Returns the selected subtype.
      Returns:
      The selected subtype.

    • setSelectedType

      void setSelectedType(int number)
      Sets the selected subtype of the event. It is set using its index so that only available subtypes are possible.
      Parameters:
      number - Index of the subtype.

    • getBox

      javafx.scene.layout.GridPane getBox()
      Returns the GUI box that is displayed inside the Event list
      Returns:
      The box that is displayed inside the Event list

    • getEditBox

      javafx.scene.layout.VBox getEditBox(Root root)
      Returns the box that allows the user to edit the event.
      Parameters:
      root - Root object where we want to render the box.
      Returns:
      The box that allows the user to edit the event.

    • getModel

      ControllerModel getModel()
      Returns a ControllerModel object that can be persisted inside an SQLite database.
      Returns:
      The persistable representation of the controller.
